```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(cluster)
```

```{r}
set.seed(343)
test <- read.csv("C:/Users/Billy/Desktop/Storage/OSMgeocodedCSV.csv")
test <- test %>% select(latitude,longitude) %>% filter(!is.na(latitude)) %>% filter(latitude < 43) %>% filter(latitude > 42) %>% filter(longitude > -71.75) %>% filter(longitude < -20)
kmean.out <- kmeans(test,50,nstart = 20)
```

```{r}
plot(test$longitude, test$latitude, col = kmean.out$cluster)
points(kmean.out$centers, col = 1:50, pch = 8,cex = 10)
```

```{r}
library(e1071)
svm(data = test, Area ~ lat)
```
